text: Bridget Elizabeth Sloan (born June 23, 1992) is an American gymnast. She is the 2009 All-Around World Champion and the 2009 All-Around U.S. National Champion. Bridget was a member of the silver medal U.S. women's gymnastics team at the 2008 Summer Olympics in Beijing. As at 2013, Sloan is a member of the NCAA University of Florida team, and the NCAA All-Around and Beam Champion. == References == Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:American gymnasts
title: Bridget Sloan
